question.title: Friendly Movies Streamed Last Month
question.exampleTestcases: {"headers": {"TVProgram": ["program_date", "content_id", "channel"], "Content": ["content_id", "title", "Kids_content", "content_type"]}, "rows": {"TVProgram": [["2020-06-10 08:00", 1, "LC-Channel"], ["2020-05-11 12:00", 2, "LC-Channel"], ["2020-05-12 12:00", 3, "LC-Channel"], ["2020-05-13 14:00", 4, "Disney Ch"], ["2020-06-18 14:00", 4, "Disney Ch"], ["2020-07-15 16:00", 5, "Disney Ch"]], "Content": [[1, "Leetcode Movie", "N", "Movies"], [2, "Alg. for Kids", "Y", "Series"], [3, "Database Sols", "N", "Series"], [4, "Aladdin", "Y", "Movies"], [5, "Cinderella", "Y", "Movies"]]}}
question.sampleTestCase: {"headers": {"TVProgram": ["program_date", "content_id", "channel"], "Content": ["content_id", "title", "Kids_content", "content_type"]}, "rows": {"TVProgram": [["2020-06-10 08:00", 1, "LC-Channel"], ["2020-05-11 12:00", 2, "LC-Channel"], ["2020-05-12 12:00", 3, "LC-Channel"], ["2020-05-13 14:00", 4, "Disney Ch"], ["2020-06-18 14:00", 4, "Disney Ch"], ["2020-07-15 16:00", 5, "Disney Ch"]], "Content": [[1, "Leetcode Movie", "N", "Movies"], [2, "Alg. for Kids", "Y", "Series"], [3, "Database Sols", "N", "Series"], [4, "Aladdin", "Y", "Movies"], [5, "Cinderella", "Y", "Movies"]]}}
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists TVProgram (program_date date, content_id int, channel varchar(30))
Create table If Not Exists Content (content_id varchar(30), title varchar(30), Kids_content ENUM('Y', 'N'), content_type varchar(30))
